Content:: The following is a list of United Nations resolutions concerning State of Palestine. From 1967 to 1989 the UN Security Council adopted 131 resolutions directly addressing the Arab–Israeli conflict, with many concerning the Palestinians; Since 2012, a number of resolutions were issued dealing directly with the modern Palestinian State. United Nations General Assembly resolutions include: United Nations Security Council resolutions include: The Permanent Observer Mission of Palestine to the United Nations has published annual compilations of resolutions concerning the "Question of Palestine" as from 1947, with text and votes, along with some additional information.[1]
Title: List of United Nations resolutions concerning Palestine - Wikipedia
